dc_title_s: Geologic map of Kentucky : showing oil and gas pools and pipelines and the eastern and western coalfields
dc_description_s: Base computed and drafted in 1917 by Lucien M. Sellier.; Includes index of productive oil and gas fields, statistics for oil and coal production, and cross section: From Mississippi River to Big Sandy River.; "Geologic and developmental data prepared by the Kentucky Geological Survey and revised, expanded, and corrected to June 1920 by Willard Rouse Jillson."|63 x 108 centimeters|Scale [1:633,600] 1 inch = 10 miles|General Map Collection
